mapper.select: SELECT post_name, uid, post_likes, post_media FROM post_info LIMIT 20;
SELECT pi.post_id, pi.post_name, pi.post_likes, pi.post_media, pi.post_detail, pi.post_rls_time FROM user_shared us INNER JOIN post_info pi on us.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE us.uid = #{uid};
SELECT pi.post_id, pi.post_name, pi.post_likes, pi.post_media, pi.post_detail, pi.post_rls_time FROM user_like ul INNER JOIN post_info pi on ul.post_id = pi.post_id WHERE ul.uid = #{uid};
